last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: While consequences return to haunt a former referee, a supportive father encourages his son to enter the ring for the fight of his life.

name: Hurts Like Hell
original_name: เจ็บเจียนตาย
overview: From illegal gambling to match-fixing, discover the seedy underworld behind the once-revered sport of Muay Thai in this drama inspired by real events.
tagline: The real winner is the survivor.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When a hotshot gambler challenges a notorious high roller with a wager during a Thai boxing match, the consequences become too much to bear.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After accepting a bribe ahead of a big match, a referee finds himself in a dilemma as he seeks to live a normal life and reconcile with his daughter.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As a skillful young Muay Thai boxer fights his way out of poverty to support his mother, a tragic outcome awaits during his most important bout.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: While consequences return to haunt a former referee, a supportive father encourages his son to enter the ring for the fight of his life.
